title: E-Commerce Platform

title: Task Management App

title: Personal Portfolio
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js 14, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. Features include a custom MDX blog, Vercel KV persistence, and a premium glassmorphism design.
